website_summaries.verdict: If you primarily need a leather sewing tools kit, this is a nice option.
pros: Clamp helps make sewing projects clean
Can also be used on denim or tarp
Includes some tools to fill in other kits
cons: You will need some extra tools for cutting and stamping, but this is a good set to aid with sewing

customer_reviews.title: Not enough alone.
customer_reviews.text: Decent starter set, but you will need a few other tools to do anything approaching good work. I would not even recommend starting with only this set because you will learn some bad habits. Buy a GOOD diamond awl, and pricking punches are also cheap and much easier to use than the wheels once they are sharpened. The cutting mat is a cutting mat. The stitching pony is where this kit shines. Update. The screw holding the back of the mechanism stripped out and it wouldn't lock. I drilled through the block and replaced the screws with bolts, much better now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. He loved it. It's a great starter kit. The only thing that was that the tools are just dumped in a box with no explanation of the purpose of each does. A guide would have been nice, along with a more organized presentation. Other than those two pounts, it was a good purchase to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Portlandgirl

customer_reviews.title: its a toy
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a toy for kids. This is the perfect example of you get what you paid for, not worth the money for the quality this kit should be 19.99. I guess it is my fault for not going with quality the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Good for knife handles
customer_reviews.text: Bought for knife making\blacksmithing for my son, he picked it out and said it has all of the basics to embellish his hand crafted tools, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: leggs

customer_reviews.title: Everything's what is ok for the money other than the edge beveler.
customer_reviews.text: All in all. Not too bad of a deal for the money. The only issue I have with this product is the edge beveler. Its completely useless. As if the mold was messed up. I hope the pictures help! P.S. the latex finger things are a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A

customer_reviews.title: It worth the money
customer_reviews.text: All the parts made of a decent quality for the money that you paid. I believe that is a great must have for starters that wants to go more serious.
customer_reviews.author: JAndujar

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like
customer_reviews.text: Kit comes as detailed and shown. The awl did come with a cracked handle but still usable. I'm new to leather crafting so for the money, I have no complaints. Overall, very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for filling in pieces I needed to fill out my leather working tools at a great price
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great all around leather tool set
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this leather tool set for the price. This is great for either a beginner just wanting to get a good starting set of tools and stitching or for a seasoned leather crafter. For the price you cannot purchase these separately and save money. Expect these to last a long time with proper care and keeping them stored in my leather making tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S & Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just trying to get started in leather working, and this kit provides a good many tools that make it easier to fabricate things in leather. You'll still need stamps, and of course, leather, but it's a great collection of "needable" tools.
customer_reviews.author: Macahuna

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection for start up designs..
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to design and development purses. This kit was a nice starting point for my needs. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Duty

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need to get started but wish the quality of tools was better! However it is a good starter kit to see what you like to do (sewing, stamping etc)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this set as a gift for my adult daughter and she loves it! I already received a nice leather gift back!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Druen

product_meta.title: LAMPTOP 33 Pieces DIY Leather Craft Tools Hand Stitching Tool Set with Stitching Pony,Matting Cut, Groover Awl Waxed Thimble Thread, Basic Hand Stitching Sewing Tools for DIY Leather Craft Man
feature_bullets: Practical and Abundant Tools Kit: 33 Pcs Leather Sewing Tools Kit, you can sew different leather, fabric, denim, canvas or tarpaulin.

43*36.5cm Leather pony tool use log, no smell and non-toxic, environmental protection, safe your health, has superb craftmanship and high quality, durable and practical, perfect for lacing, sewing, or stitching for any other uses requiring that missing third hand.
Varied Colors: 4 rolls of wax in different colors, black, coffee, ecru, beige; A richer choice to match more colors of leather and cloth.
Including Cutting Mat,short V shaped groover, Stitching Groover, frosted strip and 3 pieces wool daubers, ideal for leather edge skiving tool and burnish the leather craft edge.

More Application: Good for the basic stamping set, suitable for beginner and proficient. It's a perfect choice for small gifts to parents, family, friends especially for DIY hand stitching lovers; Note: Please be careful to use and not for children.
